prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered pouring pose with hands managing flow between vessels, chibi proportions with large prismatic geometric Structured head with unique hexagonal structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, merkaba, flower_of_life patterns, styled with Cherub influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by intelligence and neutral grey inspired by wisdom structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with stellar alignment vests and Zodiac-embroidered robes with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating flowing silk for cosmic movement, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and hexagonal emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like orb of mercy with hexagonal geometric surface combined with planetary talisman with Sacred spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor POCISNI's profile: 'He who visits those in Heaven', Aethyr BAG, Earth element, Tarot Temperance, Sephirot Chesed, Zodiac Sagittarius, embodying the essence: 'As POCISNI approaches, a hush of reverence falls a bridge between realms opens, and aspirations take wing toward the heavens under his spiritual guidance.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered pouring pose with hands managing flow between vessels
visual_elements.head_shape: large prismatic geometric Structured head with unique hexagonal structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with prismatic facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, merkaba, flower_of_life patterns, styled with Cherub influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with stellar alignment vests and Zodiac-embroidered robes
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating flowing silk for cosmic movement
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: orb of mercy with hexagonal geometric surface combined with planetary talisman
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who visits those in Heaven'
profile_data.essence: As POCISNI approaches, a hush of reverence falls a bridge between realms opens, and aspirations take wing toward the heavens under his spiritual guidance.
profile_data.angelic_role: Cherub of Bridge of Aspiration; leads earth-forged wardens.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic bridge-form emerging from earthen geometric structures, representing the transitional nature between physical and celestial realms. Structured like a living topographical matrix with crystalline nodes connecting multidimensional pathways.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Green represents Earth element and growth; bronze-gold signifies divine intelligence and Chesed's expansive wisdom. Shifting pattern reflects transformative spiritual bridging.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries symbolizing interconnected cosmic intelligence and dimensional transition
